EnemyInfo.Name: Ki-Hunter Wings C
EnemyInfo.Description:
Wing part for Ki-Hunters. The wing enemy must immediate follow the Ki-Hunter, and should be at the same position. The enemy type for the wings should be ommitted. Even if the Ki-Hunter is initially flightless, the wing enemy should be included anyways.
There are three versions of the Ki-Hunter Wings, but they are all identical, and can be interchanged if desired. They do not contain the wing graphics, so it has no effect which one is used.

Property.Name: Health
Property.Description: Amount of damage the Ki-Hunter can receive before the wings fall off.
